text: We're seeing timeout issues with PDF generation. Users are reporting 30-second waits before the system fails.
I can reproduce this. It only happens with forms over 5MB. Smaller forms work fine.
Adobe Experience Manager Forms (AEM Forms) needs better performance optimization for large PDFs.
Microsoft customer Contoso is asking for SSO integration. This is becoming a blocker for the deal.
Can we prioritize the authentication timeout issue? Multiple customers reporting this.
The form validation bug is affecting Acme Corp's production environment. They need a fix ASAP.
Login issue still not resolved. Users getting 'Session expired' errors immediately after logging in.
Performance degradation noticed in the dashboard. Page load times increased from 2s to 8s.
Export to Excel feature requested by 3 enterprise customers. This could be a differentiator.
API rate limiting causing issues for GlobalTech integration. They're hitting 429 errors.
